text:
@RandPaul Dear Rand. For your kids sake I hope for a speedy recovery. For the rest of America I hope you suffer the pain, I hope you worry about the next paycheck, ( I know you don't)
I hope you think about every person you might have given covid19. I hope you use this time to look back.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
